long_description: Sometimes you just want to pull on a comfy, no-frills pair of bike shorts for a quick spin around the 'hood. The women's Atomic Bike Shorts from SkirtSports fills the bill on that. Minimalist waistband won't dig in or create a muffin top. Leg openings are also elastic free for comfort. Polyester/spandex fabric stretches, wicks moisture and offers UPF 50+ sun protection. Mesh panels at the hips increase airflow; 2 pockets, 1 on each leg. Custom cycling chamois features perforations and brushed fabric for quick-drying comfort. Enjoy 360deg of visibility-enhancing reflectivity, thanks to reflective piping and logos. Women's Atomic Bike Shorts from SkirtSports have a 7 in. inseam.
short_description: Sometimes you just want to pull on a comfy, no-frills pair of bike shorts for a quick spin around the 'hood. The women's Atomic Bike Shorts from SkirtSports fills the bill on that.
